data.title: All the Books in the Incredible Wings of Fire Series
data.meta_description: This heart-pounding dragon saga will captivate your students'  imagination.
data.text:
If your students love action,Â adventure, and magic, consider adding the excitingÂ Wings of Fire seriesÂ by Tui T. Sutherland to your classroom library. Filled with enchanting, action-packed plots and memorable characters, these books will become a favorite for students in grades 5-8.

Available in both long-form and graphic novel formats, the Wings of Fire books appeal to avid and striving readers alike. The ongoing, riveting storylines help sharpen reading comprehension,Â vocabulary, world building, andÂ critical thinkingÂ skills â and promote the study of character development.Â

In the first book,Â Wings of Fire: The Dragonet Prophecy, readers are introduced to seven dragon clans who have been at war for generations over lost treasure. A secret movement called the Talons of Peace attempts to restore harmony among the clans, with the help of a mysterious prophecy, but it will take a major sacrifice to make that dream a reality.Â

In the most recent installment,Â Wings of Fire: The Flames of Hope,Â readers meet Luna, who has always dreamed of changing the world. When human- and dragon-kind are threatened by mortal danger, Luna decides to fly back to the land of Pantala with a team of rescue dragons. But Luna soon realizes that if she doesn't uncover a long-buried secret that threatens every living creature, she'll have to say goodbye to the world forever.Â

From providing edge-of-your-seat adventures to exploring relatable family dynamics, the Wings of Fire series will grab and hold your studentsâ attention.
